The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar
There and Back Again: In the Footsteps of J.R.R. Tolkien's England

wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|May}}
Events that occurred on 1 May.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1917]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] attends a medical board examination.  He spends some time at Hornsea Musketry Camp.
* '''[[1917]]''' - Actress [[Pauline Letts]] is born.
* '''[[1946]]''' - Actress [[Nellie Bellflower]] is born.
* '''[[1972]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Donna Sadlier|a letter to Donna Sadlier]].
* '''[[2004]]''' - ''[[There and Back Again: In the Footsteps of J.R.R. Tolkien's England]]'' is published.
* '''[[2007]] - ''[[The History of The Hobbit]] volume 1: Mr. Baggins'' is published.'''
* '''[[2008]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]: [[The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar|Shadows of Angmar]]'', "Doom of the Last-King" is released in Europe.

==In Arda==
* {{TA|2942}}:
** [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] and [[Gandalf]] reach [[Rivendell]] after their adventures at the [[Lonely Mountain]].
* {{TA|3018}}:
** [[Aragorn]] and [[Gandalf]] meet at [[Sarn Ford]]. Gandalf tells Aragorn of [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]]'s plan to leave [[the Shire]].
* {{TA|3019}}:
** [[Crowning of the King|Crowning]] of [[Aragorn|King Elessar]]. He bids [[Faramir]] to remain [[Stewards of Gondor|Steward of Gondor]].
**Ambassadors of the [[Kingdom Under the Mountain]] and the [[Kingdom of Dale]] are in [[Gondor]] for the coronation.
** [[Elrond]] and [[Arwen]] set out from [[Rivendell]].
* {{TA|3020}}:
** [[Samwise Gamgee]] marries [[Rose Cotton]].<noinclude>[[Category:Dates|122]][[de:1. Mai]][[fi:1. toukokuuta]]</noinclude>
